attributes.additional_details:
Havering council have sold the Ice rink by Queens Hospital to Morrisons the Supermarket
There will be at least 2 years before a new  rink is opened
Hundreds of children, who have spent hours,months, years  being, trained from 6 am to late will now be deprived of this (hopefully some of our future winter olympians)
The ice rink is only approx  20  years old
I would like the government to stop this sale. or to open another rink, immediately to replace this one
